stories.text:
The LWN.net site often gives connection reset errors while loading their site's pages. The browser I'm using is Firefox. This seems like something that mainly happens on their site, do they have a misconfiguration, or an especially fickle server?

When it happens, it is always possible to refresh and load the page, so it appears randomly.
stories.title: Ask HN: Why does lwn.net give connection reset errors?

The reclusive dictator behind a climate catastrophe
Why Walgreens Is in Trouble in San Francisco and Is Closing Some Stores
Nextjs usage has increased to half as much as Wordpress

stories.text:
Visual Studio Code has taken over a huge marketshare. It’s also controversial due to the proprietary marketplace and telemetry. But neither of those drawbacks seems to plausibly explain how Microsoft plans to make profits off VS Code.

I wonder what Microsoft is going to do to VS Code once mass adoption has completed.
stories.title: Ask HN: What could be the business model of VS Code?
